Obtain Adjustment for Proportion of Treatment Assignment

Source: R/variance_anhecova.R
h_adjust_pi.Rd

Obtain Adjustment for Proportion of Treatment Assignment

Usage 

h_adjust_pi(pi)

Arguments

pi

(numeric) vector of proportions.

Value

Numeric matrix.
